definition: "house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: 10 a.m. - Head over to the Urban Planning Exhibition Center, a six story building, situated on People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 参观位于人民广场的上海城市规划展示馆。

sentences.english: The teminal station is Xinzhuang. Next stop is People's square.
sentences.chinese: 本次列车开往莘庄，下一站人民广场。

sentences.english: A tight cordon of riot police, who wore helmets and wielded shields and clubs, surrounded People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 大批武警头戴钢盔手拿防护盾和警棍守卫在人民广场。

sentences.english: A large-scale “blind date” fair will be held at People's Square on this Labor Day.
sentences.chinese: 这个劳动节在人民广场会举行一场大型的公开相亲会。

sentences.english: Before liberation, the area of Shanghai People's Square and the People's Park was a famous horse racetrack.
sentences.chinese: 今人民广场和人民公园一带在解放前是著名的跑马厅。

sentences.english: People's Square is in the east of Huangpu District.
sentences.chinese: 人民广场在黄浦区的东部。

sentences.english: 9 a.m. - Breakfast calls for some of Shanghai's best dumplings at hole-in-the-wall Jia Jia Tang Bao, located near bustling People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 到人民广场附近的小店佳家汤包吃早餐。

sentences.english: Is this the right subway to go to the People's Square?
sentences.chinese: 这是去人民广场的地铁吗？

sentences.english: We're now at People's Square, you may interchange to Line 2 or Line 8.
sentences.chinese: 人民广场到了，您可换乘2号线或8号线。

sentences.english: The weekly People's Square "Marriage Market" is more crowded than most Shanghai's wet markets.
sentences.chinese: 每周人民广场婚姻市场比上海的菜市场还要拥挤。

sentences.english: They traipsed all the way to the People's Square for the celebrations of the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 他们一路闲逛，漫步来到人民广场参加国庆庆祝活动。

sentences.english: Excuse me ,but can you show me the way to People’s square?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，你能不能告诉我去人民广场的路？

sentences.english: A large-scale "blind date" fair will be held at People's Square on this Labor Day.
sentences.chinese: 劳动节一场大型相亲会将在人民广场举行。

sentences.english: The buses here can only reach Huaihai Road which is near People's Square.
sentences.chinese: 这里的公交基本只到淮海路靠近人民广场的地方。

sentences.english: As the big square with the Mao statue (Renmin Square) as well as the People's park are still on the program for today.
sentences.chinese: 人民广场上毛雕像居然也在今天的行程单上。

sentences.english: How do I get to Renmin Guangchang?

definition: Zhongshan Park, the name of numerous parks in China, honoring Sun Yat-sen 孫中山|孙中山[Sun1 Zhong1 shan1]
Wujiaochang neighborhood of Shanghai, adjacent to Fudan University
Xujiahui, an area in 徐匯區|徐汇区[Xu2 hui4 qu1], Xuhui district, central Shanghai
Nanjing St., large commercial street in Shanghai
